product_name: Complete Guide to Utah's Wilderness Areas
long_description: This thorough guide details how to safely, reliably and intelligently tour Utah's majestic wilderness areas, both designated and proposed. Text by Lynna Howard and photography by Leland Howard. Softcover; 344 pages; full-color photographs and color maps. Westcliffe Publishers; copyright 2005. Features 66 day hikes, backpacking trips and 4WD routes, plus dozens more optional excursions. With 117 glorious color photographs and 48 handy maps, this guide offers a great mix of practical information and pure inspiration. Details 99 Utah wilderness areas, wilderness study areas, and instant study areas. Plus recommended wilderness areas in 9 national parks, monuments and recreation areas. Backcountry adventurers, particularly hikers and backpackers, will find this guide an invaluable tool.
short_description: This thorough guide details how to safely, reliably and intelligently tour Utah's majestic wilderness areas, both designated and proposed.
